about.title: About
about.description: My name is Luciano, and I'm working on the Web Development since 2020.  After getting my technician degree on programming, I started my first job on a start-up that initialized me on the .NET world. I am a Full Stack developer with industry experience building websites and web applications. I specialize in .NET and have professional experience working with C# and JavaScript. I also have experience working with jQuery, CSS, HTML, SQL Server, Git and Angular.

profile.shortDescription: Working on the .NET environment and aim to specialize in Angular + .NET stack.
profile.descriptionAsPartner: About work, I consider that it's very important to maintain a good environment and communication between the participants of the team to achieve the best possible the common objective.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Here are some hard skills I used along my experiencies and by self-learning. Nowadays, I aim to specialize in another ones, but I put here the ones stand out.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: I am a Full Stack developer with industry experience building websites and web applications. I specialize in .NET and have professional experience working with C# and JavaScript. I also have experience working with jQuery, CSS, HTML, SQL Server, Git and Angular.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Web Developer with experiencie on the front-end as well as back-end. I have been working on this area for 2 years. Specially, I managed the .NET environment, with ASP NET, WEB API and databases, getting involved on different types of projects as e-commerce, landing pages, forms, advertising platform and fintech.

education.title: Education
education.first-title-description: In this career, I learnt about the workflow to pre-build a system, mananging the UML diagrams. In this final activity, my team and I worked on building a mobile app. So, here I met with Android, managing Android Studio as IDE and Java as language.
education.second-title-description: In this career I got on board about the foundations about the programming. Starting with pseudocode and about languajes, firstly C++, then C# (knowing the IDE Visual Studio) and Java (with Eclipse). About storage, I saw MS SQL Server, mySql and Oracle.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Here are some of my newest projects and apps that I have built during this timen, also some of projects where I have been working in previous jobs. As you see, I have an approach to focus my path to the front-end side. I use different libraries to explore what can I do to desing my page estructure and using various Apis to get data that I need to handle and showing it on the user interface.

footer.links: I share with you some of my social networks.
